entry.title: Sunday: A few flurries. High minus 3.
entry.summary: A few flurries ending early this afternoon then clearing. Local blowing snow late this morning and this afternoon. Local amount 2 cm. Wind southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming west 40 gusting to 60 this morning. High minus 3. Wind chill near minus 13. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Sunday 12 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: A few clouds. Low minus 13.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light near midnight. Low minus 13. Wind chill minus 13 this evening and minus 19 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Sunday 12 February 2023
